TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit PageAdapter extends System.Web.UI.Adapters.ControlAdapter
Public MustInherit Class PageAdapter Inherits ControlAdapter
public ref class PageAdapter abstract : System::Web::UI::Adapters::ControlAdapter

summary.span: 針對特定的瀏覽器來配置網頁，並提供基底類別，而所有頁面配置器都會直接或間接繼承自此基底類別。

span.span: Adapts a Web page for a specific browser and provides the base class from which all page adapters inherit, directly or indirectly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別，來配置網頁瀏覽器，瀏覽器中使用的標記語言所定義 （例如 HTML 或 XHTML） 特定類別。The class is an abstract class that adapts a Web page for a specific class of browsers, defined by the markup language that the browser uses (for example, HTML or XHTML). 大部分的轉譯行為中的靈活度可以封裝在特製化的文字寫入器類別衍生自類別中，因此它不一定需要提供的頁面配置器。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized text writer classes that derive from the class, so it is not always necessary to provide a page adapter. 從呼叫衍生的頁面配置器的大部分成員類別或從控制項配接器。Most members of derived page adapters are called from the class or from control adapters. 首先，類別或控制項的配接器偵測是否有衍生的頁面配置器中，然後呼叫的成員，或如果不存在的頁面配置器提供的功能。First, the class or control adapters detect the presence of the derived page adapter, and then call the member, or provide the functionality if the page adapter is not present. 成員類別提供下列功能：The members of the class provide the following functionality: - 並屬性會定義其他 HTTP 標頭和 HTTP`GET`和`POST`可用來變更快取的參數。The and properties define additional HTTP headers and HTTP `GET` and `POST` parameters that can be used to vary caching. 從快取初始化期間呼叫類別。They are called during cache initialization from the class. - 方法會傳回可用來保存頁面的結合的檢視和控制項狀態的物件。The method returns an object that can be used to persist the combined view and control states of the page. 它參考從衍生的頁面配置器是否存在的屬性。It is referenced from the property if a derived page adapter is present. - 方法會提供可用來參考指令碼中的表單 DHTML 程式碼片段。The method provides a DHTML code fragment that can be used to reference forms in scripts. - 如果網頁為回傳，方法會傳回回傳變數的集合。The method returns a collection of the postback variables if the page is in postback. 它由.NET Framework，而不是呼叫衍生的頁面配置器是否存在的方法。It is called by the .NET Framework instead of the method if a derived page adapter is present. - 和方法控制配接器用來呈現超連結，衍生的頁面配置器是否存在。The and methods are used by control adapters to render hyperlinks if a derived page adapter is present. - 方法呈現超連結或可以送出表單的回傳的用戶端標記。The method renders a hyperlink or postback client tag that can submit the form. - 並選項按鈕控制項配接器會使用方法來參考另選項按鈕群組中的控制項。The and methods are used by radio button control adapters to reference the other controls in a radio button group. - 屬性提供的結合控制項和檢視狀態的存取權物件，可透過內部`ClientState`屬性類別。The property provides access to the combined control and view states of the object through the internal `ClientState` property of the class. - 控制項配接器會使用方法來執行裝置特定的文字轉換。The method is used by control adapters to perform device-specific text transformation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在衍生類別，名為`CustomPageAdapter`從類別並覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class named `CustomPageAdapter` from the class and override the method. 方法會將名為屬性`src`超連結，其中包含目前頁面的參考。The method adds an attribute named `src` to a hyperlink, which contains a reference to the current page. 轉譯的頁面中的所有超連結`CustomPageAdapter`連接將會有`src`屬性。All hyperlinks rendered in pages to which `CustomPageAdapter` is attached will have the `src` attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/CS/pageadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/VB/pageadapter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 建構此配接器在內部建立對應時類別或衍生的類別。The .NET Framework constructs this adapter internally when it creates the corresponding class or derived class.

summary.span: 取得其他 HTTP 標頭的清單，而且會根據此清單為附加此衍生頁面配置器的網頁變更快取。

span.span: Gets a list of additional HTTP headers by which caching is varied for the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: ，包含 HTTP 標頭的清單，否則為 。

span.span: An that contains a list of HTTP headers; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在網站上的實體快取的網頁快取多個版本中，根據 HTTP 標頭和其他因素。Entities on the Web that cache Web pages cache multiple versions, based on the HTTP headers and other factors. 例如，版本通常會快取頁面產生的每一種語言，依據`Accept-Language`HTTP 標頭。For example, a version for each language in which a page is generated is typically cached, based on the `Accept-Language` HTTP header. 針對特定瀏覽器，可能必須變更該控制獨立於目標的快取的 HTTP 標頭除了標頭快取。For specific browsers, it might be necessary to vary caching by HTTP headers in addition to the headers that control target-independent caching. 比方說，它可能需要快取不同版本的不同螢幕大小的頁面。For example, it might be necessary to cache different versions of a page for different screen sizes. 所傳回的標頭名稱標頭的清單中新增屬性上`Vary`傳送到用戶端瀏覽器的 HTTP 標頭。The header names returned by the property are added to the list of headers on the `Vary` HTTP header sent to the client browser.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫屬性以傳回要控制特定目標的快取的其他標頭的清單。基底屬性會傳回。
When you inherit from the class, you can override the property to return a list of the additional headers to control target-specific caching. The base property returns .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByParams { get; }
.property instance class System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection CacheVaryByParams
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CacheVaryByParams As StringCollection
public: virtual property System::Collections::Specialized::StringCollection ^ CacheVaryByParams { System::Collections::Specialized::StringCollection ^ get(); };
member this.CacheVaryByParams : System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection

summary.span: 從 HTTP GET 和 POST 要求取得其他參數的清單，而且會根據此清單為附加此衍生頁面配置器的網頁變更快取。

span.span: Gets a list of additional parameters from HTTP GET and POST requests by which caching is varied for the Web page to which this derived page adapter is attached.

value.span: ，包含 GET 和 POST 參數的清單，否則為 。

span.span: An that contains a list of the GET and POST parameters; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在快取的網頁快取多個版本的網站上的實體為基礎，還有其他因素，要求參數。Entities on the Web that cache Web pages cache multiple versions based on, among other factors, the request parameters. 例如，版本會通常會快取可能會產生頁面的零售連鎖商店中的每個存放區位置根據參數名稱 (例如`StoreID`)。For example, a version for each store location within a retail chain for which a page might be generated would typically be cached based on the parameter name (for example, `StoreID`). 針對特定瀏覽器，它可能需要變更快取 get 或 POST 參數，除了參數之外，控制獨立於目標的快取。For specific browsers, it might be necessary to vary caching by GET or POST parameters in addition to the parameters that control target-independent caching. 比方說，它可能需要不同的行動電話服務提供者的快取不同版本的頁面。For example, it might be necessary to cache different versions of a page for different mobile phone service providers.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫屬性以傳回一份詳細的 GET 或 POST 參數，以控制特定目標的快取。基底方法會傳回。
When you inherit from the class, you can override the property to return a list of the additional GET or POST parameters to control target-specific caching. The base method returns .

span.span: An encoded containing the combined view and control states of the controls on the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可存取內部`ClientState`屬性類別。The property provides access to the internal `ClientState` property of the class. 檢視狀態資料的預存在內部的物件`ClientState`屬性將一律會儲存在隱藏的欄位在網頁上。View state data stored by the object in the internal `ClientState` property of will always be saved in the hidden field on the Web page.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您無法覆寫屬性不是因為。若要修改的行為衍生類別中實作新參照屬性基底類別的屬性。

When you inherit from the class, you cannot override the property because it is not . To modify the behavior of in a derived class, implement a new property that references the property of the base class.

summary.span: 判斷網頁是否在回傳中，然後傳回回傳變數的名稱/值組合。

span.span: Determines whether the Web page is in postback and returns a name/value collection of the postback variables.

returns.span: 回傳變數的 (如果有的話)，否則為 。

span.span: A of the postback variables, if any; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回其中一個下列集合：The method returns one of the following collections: - 如果 HTTP 資料傳輸方法的表單變數是`POST`。Form variables if the HTTP data transfer method is `POST`. - 如果 HTTP 方法是查詢字串變數`GET`。Query string variables if the HTTP method is `GET`.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法，以提供目標特定處理的回傳變數集合。
When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to provide target-specific handling of the postback variables collection.

The unvalidated form data.

summary.span: 傳回 DHTML 程式碼片段，用戶端瀏覽器可利用此程式碼片段參考被張貼之頁面上的表單。

span.span: Returns a DHTML code fragment that the client browser can use to reference the form on the page that was posted.

span.span: A with a reference to the form on the page that was posted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供回傳的表單的 DHTML 參考。The method provides a DHTML reference to the postback form. 程式碼片段的格式如下：The code fragment has the following format: `document.forms['` `formID` `']``document.forms['` `formID` `']`

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法，如果配接器支援的瀏覽器的標記會需要不同的格式回傳的形式參考。例如，使用 PocketPC 瀏覽器的 HTML 3.2 標準需要以下列格式：文件。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if the markup for the browser supported by the adapter requires a different format for the postback form reference. For example, the HTML 3.2 standard used by PocketPC browsers requires the following format: document.

summary.span: 傳回網頁所使用的物件，以維護控制項和檢視狀態。

span.span: Returns an object that is used by the Web page to maintain the control and view states.

returns.span: 衍生自 的物件，可支援 的結合控制項和檢視狀態的建立及擷取作業。

span.span: An object derived from that supports creating and extracting the combined control and view states for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性使用方法來傳回物件，而衍生自類別的 forms，並擷取頁面的結合的控制項和檢視狀態。The property uses the method to return the object, derived from the class, that forms and extracts the combined control and view states for the page. 如果沒有任何衍生的頁面配置器附加至頁面上，物件用來維護 頁面上的隱藏欄位中的狀態。If there is no derived page adapter attached to the page, a object is used to maintain the state in a hidden field on the page. |連結類型Link type|產生連結Resulting link| |---------------|--------------------| |實體參考，cer 的程式碼Code Entity Reference,cer|| |程式碼實體的參考名稱 cerqCode Entity Reference Qualified, cerq|| |實體參考特定，cer 的程式碼Code Entity Reference Specific,cers|| |程式碼實體參考限定特定 cerqsCode Entity Reference Qualified Specific, cerqs||

span.para: 檢視狀態資料的預存在內部的物件屬性將一律會儲存在隱藏的欄位在網頁上。
View state data stored by the object in the internal property of the will always be saved in the hidden field on the Web page.
當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法來傳回另一個衍生的頁面狀態 persister，如果不可行 （例如，因為有限的資源） 維護的組合的狀態可隱藏欄位中。基底類別傳回物件。您可以使用類別，以維持工作階段狀態中的頁面狀態。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to return another derived page state persister if it is not feasible to maintain the combined state in a hidden field (for example, because of limited resources). The base class returns a object. You can use the class to maintain the page state in session state.

summary.span: 將選項按鈕控制項加入指定選項按鈕群組的集合中。

span.span: Adds a radio button control to the collection for a specified radio button group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會使用維護一份選項按鈕群組的物件。The class uses a object to maintain a list of radio button groups. 在每個項目的集合選項按鈕群組中的控制項。Each element in is a collection of the controls in a radio button group. 方法會加入控制項加入適當的集合，建立集合，如果已經存在，以及建立如果那里不先前註冊控制項。The method adds a control to the appropriate collection, creating the collection if it does not already exist, and creating if there are no previously registered controls. 選項按鈕控制項配接器使用並方法，以參考其他選項按鈕群組中的控制項。Radio button control adapters use the and methods to reference the other controls in a radio button group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法寫入開頭的超連結標記。The method writes an opening hyperlink tag. 當`writer`是，此標籤具有下列格式：When `writer` is , this tag has the following format: ```` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在衍生類別，名為`CustomPageAdapter`從類別並覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class named `CustomPageAdapter` from the class and override the method. 方法會將名為屬性`src`超連結，其中包含目前頁面的參考。The method adds an attribute named `src` to a hyperlink, which contains a reference to the current page. 轉譯的頁面中的所有超連結`CustomPageAdapter`連接將會有`src`屬性。All hyperlinks rendered in pages to which `CustomPageAdapter` is attached will have the `src` attribute. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/CS/pageadapter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Adapters.PageAdapter.RenderBeginHyperlink/VB/pageadapter.vb#1)]

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫撰寫不同的格式為開頭的超連結標記或撰寫額外的標記屬性的方法。例如，基底方法不會寫入屬性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to write a different format for an opening hyperlink tag or to write additional tag attributes. For example, the base method does not write an attribute for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法寫入開頭的超連結標記。The method writes an opening hyperlink tag. 當`writer`是物件，此標記必須以下列格式：When `writer` is an object, this tag has the following format: ```` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何在衍生類別，名為`CustomPageAdapter`從類別並覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates how to derive a class named `CustomPageAdapter` from the class and override the method. 加入名為屬性`src`超連結，其中包含目前頁面的參考。 adds an attribute named `src` to a hyperlink, which contains a reference to the current page. 轉譯的頁面中的所有超連結`CustomPageAdapter`連接將會有`src`屬性。All hyperlinks rendered in pages to which `CustomPageAdapter` is attached will have the `src` attribute. When you inherit from the class, you can override the method to write a different format for an opening hyperlink tag or to write additional tag attributes. For example, the base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 將回傳事件以超連結的形式呈現到回應資料流中，其中包含已編碼及可能已加密的檢視狀態，以及事件目標和引數。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded and possibly encrypted view state, and event target and argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會寫入為 scriptless 超連結的回傳事件。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法如果不同的格式為需要回傳事件的超連結，或瀏覽器具有其他唯一的需求。例如，某些瀏覽器要求不能為空白的連結是否要呈現的超連結文字。您也可以覆寫如果有限的資源可讓您防止包括做為 URL 參數的檢視狀態。基底方法不會寫入屬性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements. For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render. You can also override if limited resources prevent including the view state as a URL parameter. The base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 將回傳事件以超連結的形式呈現到回應資料流中，其中包含已編碼及可能已加密的檢視狀態、事件目標和引數、之前頁面的參數以及便捷鍵。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded and possibly encrypted view state, an event target and argument, a previous-page parameter, and an access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會寫入回傳事件以 scriptless 的超連結，包括可能區塊檢視狀態`__EVENTTARGET=target`， `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`，`__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath`參數，和`accessKey="accessKey"`屬性。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink, including the possibly chunked view state, `__EVENTTARGET=target`, `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`, `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` parameters, and an `accessKey="accessKey"` attribute. 如果加密的檢視狀態`enableViewStateMac`的屬性[pages 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458)組態項目設為`true`。View state is encrypted if the `enableViewStateMac` attribute of the [pages Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) configuration element is set to `true`.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法如果不同的格式為需要回傳事件的超連結，或瀏覽器具有其他唯一的需求。例如，某些瀏覽器要求不能為空白的連結是否要呈現的超連結文字。您也可以覆寫如果有限的資源可讓您防止包括做為 URL 參數的檢視狀態。基底方法不會寫入屬性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements. For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render. You can also override if limited resources prevent including the view state as a URL parameter. The base method does not write an attribute for .

summary.span: 將回傳事件以超連結的形式呈現到回應資料流中，其中包含已編碼的檢視狀態、事件目標和引數、之前頁面的參數以及便捷鍵。

span.span: Renders a postback event into the response stream as a hyperlink, including the encoded view state, an event target and argument, a previous-page parameter, and an access key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會寫入回傳事件以 scriptless 的超連結，包括可能區塊檢視狀態`__EVENTTARGET=target`， `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`，`__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath`參數，和`accessKey="accessKey"`屬性。The method writes a postback event as a scriptless hyperlink, including the possibly chunked view state, `__EVENTTARGET=target`, `__EVENTARGUMENT=argument`, `__PREVIOUSPAGE=currentFilePath` parameters, and an `accessKey="accessKey"` attribute.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫方法如果不同的格式為需要回傳事件的超連結，或瀏覽器具有其他唯一的需求。例如，某些瀏覽器要求不能為空白的連結是否要呈現的超連結文字。您也可以覆寫如果有限的資源造成包括做為 URL 參數的檢視狀態。基底方法不會寫入屬性。

When you inherit from the class, you can override the method if a different format is required for the postback event hyperlink or the browser has other unique requirements. For example, some browsers require the hyperlink text to be nonempty if the link is to render. You can also override if limited resources prevent including view state as a URL parameter. The base method does not write an attribute for .

param.name: text
param.span: ，為要轉換的文字。

span.span: A that is the text to transform.

summary.span: 轉換目標瀏覽器的文字。

span.span: Transforms text for the target browser.
A that contains the transformed text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可用，例如，轉換定位點字元 (`\t`) 到分行符號 (`\n`)。The method can be used, for example, to transform tab characters (`\t`) into line breaks (`\n`). 基底方法會傳回`text`不變。The base method returns `text` unchanged.

span.para: 當您繼承自類別，您可以覆寫如果特定的標記具有不同的標準 HTML 表單的建構。例如，如果瀏覽器需要不同的識別項的標記比什麼會在 HTML 中，使用可以覆寫方法，以尋找該標記，並將它變更。

When you inherit from the class, you can override if a particular markup has a construct with a different form from standard HTML. For example, if a browser requires a different identifier for a tag than what would be used in HTML, method can be overridden to find that tag and change it.
